feed.title: RSSOwl - A Java RSS / RDF / Atom Newsreader - May the owl be with you

entry.title: Article on RSSOwl in german Java Magazin
entry.content:
I wrote an article about RSSOwl for the popular german Java Magazin. It was added to this months issue and the article is even featured on the front page.

More information is available here.

Ben

entry.title: RSSOwl 1.2.1 Beta-Test *update*
entry.content:
It's been a while since the last beta-test, but here we go again with fresh new version RSSOwl 1.2.1, which I am about to release in the next couple of weeks.
It includes a lot of bugfixes and some really cool new features that improve usability.

The preview is online for all operating systems at:
  • http://www.rssowl.org/dl/Integration_Build/
If you are interested in testing each bit of the new features and bugfixes, please follow the testplan at:
  • http://www.rssowl.org/dl/Integration_Build/testplan.txt
If you are interested in just using RSSOwl 1.2.1 preview, checkout the changelog at:
  • http://www.rssowl.org/dl/Integration_Build/changelog.txt
If you encounter any bug or issue, please directly contact me via eMail or join our IRC channel #rssowl at irc.freenode.net.

Update: Uploaded a new Beta (Changelog).
